meanings.definition: Of or relating to endamebic infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed medication for the endamebic infection.
meanings.sent2: The endamebic infection was spreading rapidly in the community.
meanings.sent3: The endamebic infection decided to take a vacation and left the body feeling better.
meanings.sent4: The endamebic infection was like a sneaky spy, hiding in plain sight.
meanings.sent5: The endamebic infection was as stubborn as a mule, refusing to go away easily.

meanings.definition: Caused by or characteristic of endamebic parasites.
meanings.sent1: The endamebic parasites were causing havoc in the intestines.
meanings.sent2: The symptoms were typical of an infection caused by endamebic parasites.
meanings.sent3: The endamebic parasites threw a party in the stomach, causing discomfort.
meanings.sent4: Her body felt like a battleground, fighting off the endamebic parasites.
meanings.sent5: The presence of endamebic parasites was as clear as day in the lab results.
